name: Night Watch (itch) (RavenBP, Acercam)
description:
How to Play: 

Use WASD to move your player throughout the world. Use your mouse to interact with onscreen UI elements. When walking through tall grass, there is a possibility that you may be ambushed by an enemy. Use your abilities to defeat enemies that you encounter. When you win an encounter, you will get a new ability.
